critical_fixes_final.context: Background processing threads in runspaces cannot access module functions
critical_fixes_final.solution: Move processing logic inline or pass functions as script blocks to runspace
critical_fixes_final.impact: Enables proper background alert processing with statistics tracking
critical_fixes_final.critical: Always consider function scope when implementing background threads in PowerShell modules

critical_fixes_final.context: Correlation algorithms require consistent data structure between storage and processing
critical_fixes_final.solution: Store original alert data in history entries for correlation access
critical_fixes_final.impact: Enables effective alert correlation with similarity scoring
critical_fixes_final.critical: Ensure data model consistency between storage and processing algorithms
